column1: Baby Barnaby's////A friend picked this place for brunch one Saturday. I had never been. We got there at 1pm
column3: but still received great service. The coffee was good and the food was better. We both got the green eggs which I had read about here on yelp and I was not disappointed. The plate of food was so huge
column4: my friend and I could have easily shared. Everything tasted fantastic. I can't wait to go back and try everything else on the menu I highly recommend this place.
